ProductInfo.Features:
LED delivers amazing brightness, clarity, and color detail
HD TV provides clear and vibrant picture quality
Green friendly (RoHS compliant, EcoSmart Smart Energy Saving levels, and Energy Star 5.3 qualified)
Public Display Settings can be easily programmed by the installer to have the TV turn on at a specified channel/volume level, set the minimum/ maximum volume, lock out the control panel/remote, set the aspect ratio, and return to a factory reset
USB cloning allows for easy transfer of Public Display Settings from the "Master TV" to an unlimited number of same type televisions
ProductInfo.Name: 22" LED 768p Black
